Container.Name: frpc
Container.Description: [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']应用介绍[/span][/u][/b][br] This project provides a version of VS Code that runs a server on a remote machine and allows access through a modern web browser. It's based on the very same architecture used by Gitpod or GitHub Codespaces at scale.[br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']文档介绍[/span][/u][/b][br] https://github.com/gitpod-io/openvscode-server[br][br]
Container.Overview: This project provides a version of VS Code that runs a server on a remote machine and allows access through a modern web browser. It's based on the very same architecture used by Gitpod or GitHub Codespaces at scale.

Config.Name: workspace
Config.Description: 该目录将映射到容器中的 /home/workspace
